duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, curate, and manage published content across JL Klein's social media platforms.
Design and implement a comprehensive social media strategy to enhance brand visibility and boost organic growth.
Engage with the audience, respond to queries, and foster community participation.
Monitor, analyze, and report on performance metrics to gauge ROI and refine strategies.
Stay abreast of the latest industry trends and innovations in social media to maintain a competitive edge.
Work closely with other departments to align the company's branding and promotional efforts.
Plan and execute paid social media campaigns when necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
